text: Nílton de Sordi (14 February, 1931 - 24 August 2013)De Sordi, campeão mundial de 58, morre aos 82 anos was a former Brazilian football player. He has played for Brazil national team. ==Honours== ; São Paulo *Campeonato Paulista: 1953, 1957 ; Brazil *FIFA World Cup: 1958 == References == Category:1931 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Footballers from São Paulo (state)
title: Nílton de Sordi
